settings.text: Celebrate Rohto Pharmaceuticals' century-long skincare legacy with Hada Labo's trusted, effective, and gentle Japanese moisturizing rituals.

settings.title: Brand
Products
Shipping & Delivery
Return & Refunds
What is Hada Labo?
settings.content: Hada Labo, Japan's top skincare brand, is renowned for its exceptional hydration and scientifically backed beauty solutions. Our premium products are accessible worldwide.

settings.title: What is the meaning of Hada Labo?
settings.content: HADA means SKIN in Japanese, and LABO stands for LABORATORY. Together, Hada Labo translates to SKIN LAB.

settings.title: What is the history of Hada Labo Tokyo?
settings.content: Hada Labo Tokyo draws from over 120 years of skincare expertise by Rohto Pharmaceuticals, established in 1899, blending traditional Japanese craftsmanship with modern innovation.

settings.title: What is Hada Labo Tokyo's skincare philosophy?
settings.content: Our philosophy is “Give the skin what it needs, and do not give it anything unnecessary,” focusing on simplicity and efficacy to meet your skin's needs without over-complication.

settings.title: What makes Hada Labo Tokyo's products unique?
settings.content: Our products feature unique Super Hyaluronic Acid and handpicked ingredients, designed to hydrate and restore comfort to dry, dehydrated, and sensitive skin.

settings.title: Is Hada Labo Fragrance-Free?
settings.content: Yes! Hada Labo Tokyo products are fragrance-free, making them ideal for those who prefer skincare without perfume. They also avoid parabens, dyes, and mineral oils, ensuring compatibility with even the most sensitive skin.

settings.title: What is the Hada Labo skincare ritual?
settings.content: The Hada Labo skincare routine is a 4-step Japanese moisturizing regimen designed to maximize the benefits of their unique products, resulting in deeply hydrated and radiant skin.

settings.title: Are Hada Labo products non-comedogenic?
settings.content: Yes, Hada Labo products are non-comedogenic and suitable for all skin types. They do not contain mineral oil and will not contribute to clogged pores.

settings.title: Are Hada Labo products suitable for sensitive skin?
settings.content: Yes, Hada Labo products are formulated to be safe and effective for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Their super hydrating formulas help reduce sensitivity and redness, leaving your skin plump and hydrated. Always consult your dermatologist if you have any concerns.

settings.title: What is Super Hyaluronic Acid and its importance?
settings.content: Super Hyaluronic Acid, exclusive to Hada Labo products, blends three types of hyaluronic acid: HA+ (deep penetration), MICRO HA (multi-layer hydration), and MACRO HA (surface moisture lock). This combination ensures comprehensive, deep hydration.

settings.title: What are the shipping methods and charges for Hada Labo Tokyo orders within Europe?
settings.content:
Standard Shipping (5-8 Days):

  • Orders below €50: €4.99
  • Orders above €50: Free

Express Shipping (2-3 Days):

  • All orders: €9.50

settings.title: How long does it take for Hada Labo Tokyo to process and ship my order?
settings.content: Orders are processed and shipped within 0-1 business days from the time the order is placed.

settings.title: Do you provide tracking information for shipped orders?
settings.content: Yes, all shipping methods include tracking. Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number to monitor the progress of your delivery.

settings.title: Who is responsible for customs and import taxes on Hada Labo Tokyo orders?
settings.content: Customers are responsible for any customs or import taxes that may apply to their orders. Please note that these fees are not included in our shipping charges.

settings.title: What should I do if I receive the wrong item or my order is incomplete?
settings.content: If you receive the wrong item or your order is incomplete, please contact our customer service team so we can resolve the issue promptly.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.content: Our return policy allows you to request a return within 30 days of receiving your item. To be eligible, the item must be in the same condition as when you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. A receipt or proof of purchase is also required.

settings.title: How do I initiate a return?
settings.content: To start a return, contact us at [EMAIL]. Once your return request is accepted, we will send you a return shipping label and instructions on how and where to send your package. Please note that items sent back to us without first requesting a return will not be accepted.

settings.title: What should I do if I receive a damaged or defective item?
settings.content: Please inspect your order upon reception and contact us immediately at [EMAIL] if the item is defective, damaged, or if you receive the wrong item. We will evaluate the issue and work to make it right.

settings.title: Trade & Wholesale enquiries
settings.content: Please contact us atorders@wildnutrition.comWe'd love to help you show your appreciation to your team with a wellness gift. Whether you want to say thanks, welcome a new starter with a gift pack or add to your company benefits, we can help create a bespoke offering to suit your needs. Contact us at corporate@wildnutrition.com

settings.content:
You can contact us via email or online chat. Alternatively, please complete the short form below and our customer service team will be in touch as soon as they can.

settings.title: When will my order be shipped?
settings.content:
We do our very best to get your order to you as soon as we can. 

All UK orders for standard delivery will be shipped between 2-4 working days
If you have selected our next day delivery option, orders must be placed by 3pm (Monday-Friday) to be delivered on the next business day. (UK only)
For all orders you will receive tracking details by email once your order has shipped. Please login to your account or contact our team via email should you have any questions about your order- care@wildnutrition.com

settings.title: Tell me about shipping to the UK
settings.content:
We offer two shipping options:

  • Standard Tracked (2-3 business days):
    - Free for subscription orders
    - Free for one-time orders over £40
    - £3.95 for one-time orders under £40

  • Next Business Day* (1-2 business days)
    - £5.95 for one-time orders and subscriptions

* Please note Next Business Day orders (Monday- Friday- exc. Bank Holidays) placed over the weekend will be processed on the next business day. Only valid for Mainland UK addresses.

settings.title: Standard Product Returns
settings.content:
This returns policy applies to products bought directly from our website. If you have purchased products from a retailer or other online retailer then please contact them for their own returns and refund procedures.

We are happy to refund or exchange any product returned within 14 days of purchase, if it is returned in its original state, unused and in original packaging. Please email us at care@wildnutrition.com prior to returning your item to let us know to expect your return. Proof of purchase is required.  

Assuming the item(s) are in good condition we will then process your refund. Refunds are made to your original payment method and depending on your payment issuers policies, there may be a couple of days’ delay in being credited.

settings.title: Returns for Subscription Customers
settings.content: With all subscription orders, due to the nature of the automatic shipping every 30 days, we require a minimum of 3 business days notice prior to your order being shipped if you wish to cancel or amend your subscription. Once a subscription is triggered (and you receive an email confirming it is being shipped) it is sent for immediate dispatch. If your order has already shipped, we will not be able to issue a refund.

settings.title: Are your products Vegan?
settings.content: Not every product in our range is Vegan, but we have a range of Vegan supplements.

settings.title: Are there any items that cannot be returned?
settings.content: Yes, certain items are non-returnable. These include perishable goods (such as food, flowers, or plants), custom products (such as special orders or personalized items), personal care goods (such as beauty products), hazardous materials, flammable liquids, and gases. Additionally, we do not accept returns on sale items or gift cards. If you have any questions about the return eligibility of your item, please contact us at [EMAIL].

settings.title: How will I receive my refund and how long will it take?
settings.content: Once we receive and inspect your return, we will notify you if the refund is approved. If approved, the refund will be automatically processed to your original payment method within 10 business days. Please note that it may take some time for your bank or credit card company to process and post the refund. If more than 15 business days have passed since your return was approved, please contact us at [EMAIL].

settings.title: POWER UP YOUR SKIN
settings.subtitle:
Dewy, plump, hydrated skin is the dream, but the reality is that sun, pollutants, late nights and the daily grind really take their toll. Skin is our largest organ so it makes sense to nourish it from within. Natural Glow is a beautiful supplement, formulated by our founder Henrietta Norton, to naturally accelerate your body’s collagen, keratin and melanin. And with it, a fresh sun-kissed glow for that post-holiday radiance. 

With central heating, aircon and life’s daily stressors drying out skin, our Complete Beauty Support contains Vitamin C to support the formation of collagen, skin’s essential ‘scaffolding’ protein, along with Zinc for healthy hair and nails. Visit our Beauty collection for supplements they’ll love to open every day.

settings.title:
Reliable Formulations,
Backed by Science
settings.text:
Discover the perfect harmony of innovation and simplicity in our expertly crafted formulas. Hada Labo products are designed to pamper the skin with premium, lightweight textures, specifically tailored for dry, dehydrated, and sensitive skin.

Supported by scientific research, our carefully formulated products provide radiant, well-hydrated, and youthful skin, showcasing the precise balance of ingredients and processes that define them.

settings.heading: Discover the Secret to Perfect Skin
